text: The iHeartRadio Music Award for Best Female Artist was first presented in 2016. ==Winners and nominees== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! bgcolor="#efefef"|Year ! bgcolor="#efefef" width=250px|Recipient ! bgcolor="#efefef" width=300px class=unsortable|Nominees ! bgcolor="#efefef" width=10px class=unsortable|Ref |- ! scope="row"|2016 | Taylor Swift | *Adele *Selena Gomez *Meghan Trainor *Carrie Underwood | |- ! scope="row"|2017 | Adele | *Selena Gomez *Ariana Grande *Rihanna *Sia | |- ! scope="row"|2018 | Taylor Swift | *Alessia Cara *Rihanna *Halsey *Pink | |- ! scope="row"|2019 | Ariana Grande | *Camila Cabello *Cardi B *Halsey *Dua Lipa | |- ! scope="row"| 2020 | Billie Eilish | *Ariana Grande *Halsey *Lizzo *Taylor Swift | https://www.iheart.com/content/2020-01-08-2020-iheartradio-music- awards-nominees-revealed-see-the-full-list/ |} ==Records/Stats== * Most Wins: ** Taylor Swift – 2 wins * Most Nominations: ** Taylor Swift, Ariana Grande and Halsey – 3 nominations ** Adele, Selena Gomez and Rihanna – 2 nominations ==See also== * List of music awards honoring women ==References== Category:IHeartRadio Music Awards Category:Music awards honoring women Category:Awards established in 2016
title: IHeartRadio Music Award for Female Artist of the Year
